meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the use of psychic powers or mental abilities.
meanings.sent1: The psionic energy surrounding the room was palpable.
meanings.sent2: She had a psionic connection with her twin sister.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed it had psionic powers to control the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: Her psionic intuition guided her through the maze of decisions.
meanings.sent5: The psionic aura shimmered with colors unseen by the naked eye.

meanings.definition: A person who possesses or uses psionic powers.
meanings.sent1: The psionic was known for his ability to read minds.
meanings.sent2: She trained with other psionics to enhance her abilities.
meanings.sent3: The psionic accidentally sent a telepathic message to the wrong person.
meanings.sent4: He was a psionic powerhouse in the world of psychic phenomena.
meanings.sent5: The group of psionics gathered to discuss their latest discoveries.
